702837f-a.title: Brooklyn: 72nd Street - 3rd Avenue
702837f-a.text:
218-230 72nd Street, south side, between Third Ave., and Ridge Blvd.
The view shows a frame building at 218 and 224 72nd Street.
May 10, 1921.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

702836f-a.title: Brooklyn: 72nd Street - 3rd Avenue
702836f-a.text:
(1)
212-218 72nd Street, south side, between Third Ave., and Ridge
Blvd. The buildings concerned are frame.
May 10, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from a slightly different angle, showing frame houses
at Nos. 212-214 72nd Street, and a large apartment house at the
S.E. corner of Ridge Blvd., and 72nd Street.
May 10, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same, from a different angle.
May 10, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

702835f-a.title: Brooklyn: 72nd Street - 3rd Avenue
702835f-a.text:
72nd Street, north side, between Third Ave., and Ridge Blvd. The
view shows an excavation at rear of School No. 102. At the right, are
frame buildings belonging to the school.
May 10, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REP ODUCTIONS.

702838f-a.title: Brooklyn: 72nd Street - 3rd Avenue
702838f-a.text:
224-230 72nd Street, south side, between Third Ave., and Ridge Blvd.
The view shows a frame house at No. 226.
May 8, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
